title: Linnea nel giardino di Monet
author: Lena Anderson & Christina Bj√∂rk
description: This description may be from another edition of this product. 25th Anniversary Edition Linnea has been in Paris. And she has visited the painter Claude Monet's garden She even stood on the same little Japanese bridge that Monet painted so often in his pictures. In Paris, Linnea got to see many of the real paintings. Now she can understand what it means to be called an Impressionist, and she knows a lot about Monet's life in the pink house where he lived with his eight children.
